summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Sections 21.40.050, 21.40.060, 21.40.080 and 21.76.040 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Ordinances 90379 and 104472, as amended) as of June 1, 1987, to increase collection rates and charges of the Solid Waste Utility; modify the rate of credit for the elderly, handicapped or disabled; and establish fees for disposal by passenger cars at transfer stations.
